\fs24\lang1033\langfe1033\cgrid\langnp1033\langfenp1033 {\fs20\insrsid11215474 Facility Name:\tab }{\fs20\insrsid16324746\charrsid3826418 Peco Foods, Inc.

srsid16324746\charrsid3826418 EPA ID:\tab \tab 1100 00}{\fs20\insrsid5070876 37}{\fs20\insrsid16324746\charrsid3826418  }{

\fs20\insrsid5070876 6290}{\fs20\insrsid16324746\charrsid3826418 

\par }\pard \ql \li0\ri0\widctlpar\aspalpha\aspnum\faauto\adjustright\rin0\lin0\itap0 {\insrsid16324746 

\par }{\fs20\insrsid16324746\charrsid3826418 PECO FOODS, INC.

\par }{\fs20\insrsid5070876 Canton, Mississippi}{\fs20\insrsid16324746\charrsid3826418 

\par 

\par RISK MANAGEMENT PLAN

\par Executive Summary

\par 

\par {\listtext\pard\plain\fs20\insrsid16324746\charrsid3826418 \hich\af0\dbch\af0\loch\f0 1.\tab}}\pard \ql \fi-360\li720\ri0\widctlpar\jclisttab\tx720\aspalpha\aspnum\faauto\ls1\adjustright\rin0\lin720\itap0\pararsid16324746 {

\fs20\insrsid16324746\charrsid3826418 ACCIDENTAL RELEASE PREVENTION AND EMERGENCY RESPONSE POLICIES}{\fs20\insrsid16324746 

\par }\pard \ql \li360\ri0\widctlpar\aspalpha\aspnum\faauto\adjustright\rin0\lin360\itap0\pararsid13073620 {\fs20\insrsid13073620\charrsid3826418 

\par }\pard \ql \li360\ri0\widctlpar\aspalpha\aspnum\faauto\adjustright\rin0\lin360\itap0\pararsid16324746 {\fs20\insrsid16324746\charrsid3826418 

At this Peco Foods facility, we utilize anhydrous ammonia which is considered hazardous by the Environmental Protection Agency (EPA).  The properties which make ammonia valuable as a refrigeran

t also necessitate certain safety precautions.  Peco strives to protect all its valuable resources and assets \endash 

 both personnel and property.  We live and have families in this community.  We want to prevent exposure to all our personnel as well as nearby m

embers of our community, existing natural resources, and the surrounding environment.  It is our policy to comply with all Federal, State, and local regulations.  Through continual, accurate training and various safety devises and procedures, we work to m

inimize potential releases.

\par 

\par Our emergency response program has specific procedures for accidental relea

ses of anhydrous ammonia as well as other emergencies.  We work in conjunction with the }{\fs20\insrsid5070876 Canton}{\fs20\insrsid16324746\charrsid3826418 

 Fire Department and the }{\fs20\insrsid5070876 Madison County}{\fs20\insrsid16324746\charrsid3826418  Local Emergency Planning Committee to prepare for necessary notification of all affected neighbors.

\par 

\par {\listtext\pard\plain\fs20\insrsid16324746\charrsid3826418 \hich\af0\dbch\af0\loch\f0 2.\tab}}\pard \ql \fi-360\li720\ri0\widctlpar\jclisttab\tx720\aspalpha\aspnum\faauto\ls1\adjustright\rin0\lin720\itap0\pararsid16324746 {

\fs20\insrsid16324746\charrsid3826418 THE STATIONARY SOURCE AND REGULATED SUBSTANCES HANDLED

\par }\pard \ql \li360\ri0\widctlpar\aspalpha\aspnum\faauto\adjustright\rin0\lin360\itap0\pararsid16324746 {\fs20\insrsid16324746\charrsid3826418 

\par The primary purpose of our facility is the temporary storage of refrigerated and frozen foods.  We utilize anhydrou

s ammonia as the primary means for refrigeration and freezing.  An outside company is used to fill our main receiver tanks.  Piping then carries the ammonia to the needed refrigeration or freezing units.  Access to the site is restricted to facility emplo

yees, authorized management personnel and authorized contractors.

\par 

\par The regulated substance used at our facility is anhydrous ammonia.  The maximum amount of ammonia stored at this facility is }{\fs20\insrsid10977016 51,000}{\fs20\insrsid16324746\charrsid3826418  pounds.  We have the capacity for more but do not run abo}{

\fs20\insrsid89176 ve}{\fs20\insrsid16324746\charrsid3826418  80% of total capacity.

\par 

\par {\listtext\pard\plain\fs20\insrsid16324746\charrsid3826418 \hich\af0\dbch\af0\loch\f0 3.\tab}}\pard \ql \fi-360\li720\ri0\widctlpar\jclisttab\tx720\aspalpha\aspnum\faauto\ls1\adjustright\rin0\lin720\itap0\pararsid9655471 {

\fs20\insrsid16324746\charrsid3826418 THE WORST CASE RELEASE SCENARIO(S) AND THE ALTERNATIVE RELEASE SCENARIO(S), INCLUDI

NG ADMINISTRATIVE CONTROLS AND MI}{\fs20\insrsid9655471\charrsid3826418 

TIGATION MEASURES TO LIMIT THE DISTANCES FOR EACH REPORTED SCENARIO}{\fs20\insrsid16324746\charrsid3826418 

\par }\pard \ql \li360\ri0\widctlpar\aspalpha\aspnum\faauto\adjustright\rin0\lin360\itap0\pararsid9655471 {\fs20\insrsid9655471\charrsid3826418 

\par Worst Case Scenario

\par The worst case scenario would be a release of }{\fs20\insrsid10977016 13,920}{\fs20\insrsid9655471\charrsid3826418  pounds of ammonia.  It is assumed that the contents are released as a two phase flow (gas and aerosol-ALOHA).

\par Distance to endpoint:  }{\fs20\insrsid10977016 1.9}{\fs20\insrsid9655471\charrsid3826418  miles

\par 

\par Alternative Scenario

\par The alternative scenario would be a release of approximately 2,}{\fs20\insrsid14056128 408}{\fs20\insrsid9655471\charrsid3826418  pounds of ammonia.

\par Distance to endpoint:  0.}{\fs20\insrsid12655891 09}{\fs20\insrsid9655471\charrsid3826418  miles (}{\fs20\insrsid12655891 1}{\fs20\insrsid15878889 61}{\fs20\insrsid9655471\charrsid3826418  yards)

\par 

\par {\listtext\pard\plain\fs20\insrsid9655471\charrsid3826418 \hich\af0\dbch\af0\loch\f0 4.\tab}}\pard \ql \fi-360\li720\ri0\widctlpar\jclisttab\tx720\aspalpha\aspnum\faauto\ls1\adjustright\rin0\lin720\itap0\pararsid9655471 {

\fs20\insrsid9655471\charrsid3826418 FIVE-YEAR ACCIDENT HISTORY

\par }\pard \ql \li360\ri0\widctlpar\aspalpha\aspnum\faauto\adjustright\rin0\lin360\itap0\pararsid9655471 {\fs20\insrsid9655471\charrsid3826418 

\par To date, }{\fs20\insrsid2431242\charrsid3826418 this Peco facility has had no reportable releases.}{\fs20\insrsid9655471\charrsid3826418 

\par }{\fs20\insrsid2431242\charrsid3826418 

\par {\listtext\pard\plain\fs20\insrsid2431242\charrsid3826418 \hich\af0\dbch\af0\loch\f0 5.\tab}}\pard \ql \fi-360\li720\ri0\widctlpar\jclisttab\tx720\aspalpha\aspnum\faauto\ls1\adjustright\rin0\lin720\itap0\pararsid2431242 {

\fs20\insrsid2431242\charrsid3826418 THE RMP MANAGEMENT

PROGRAM

\par }\pard \ql \li360\ri0\widctlpar\aspalpha\aspnum\faauto\adjustright\rin0\lin360\itap0\pararsid2431242 {\fs20\insrsid2431242\charrsid3826418 

\par The management of the RMP program will be handled by }{\fs20\insrsid15878889 Bruce Johnson}{\fs20\insrsid2431242\charrsid3826418 .  Mr. }{\fs20\insrsid15878889 Johnson}{\fs20\insrsid2431242\charrsid3826418 

 will administrate in conjunction with the Peco management and personnel.  Other entities or organizations that will be coordinated }{\fs20\insrsid13073620 

\par 

\par }\pard \ql \li0\ri0\widctlpar\aspalpha\aspnum\faauto\adjustright\rin0\lin0\itap0\pararsid13073620 {\fs20\insrsid13073620 Facility Name:\tab }{\fs20\insrsid13073620\charrsid3826418 Peco Foods, Inc.

\par }\pard \ql \li0\ri0\widctlpar\brdrb\brdrs\brdrw30\brsp20 \aspalpha\aspnum\faauto\adjustright\rin0\lin0\itap0\pararsid13073620 {\fs20\insrsid13073620\charrsid3826418 EPA ID:\tab \tab 1100 }{\fs20\insrsid1277312 0037}{\fs20\insrsid13073620\charrsid3826418  

}{\fs20\insrsid1277312 6290}{\fs20\insrsid13073620\charrsid3826418 

\par }\pard \ql \li0\ri0\widctlpar\aspalpha\aspnum\faauto\adjustright\rin0\lin0\itap0\pararsid13073620 {\insrsid13073620 

\par }\pard \ql \li360\ri0\widctlpar\aspalpha\aspnum\faauto\adjustright\rin0\lin360\itap0\pararsid2431242 {\fs20\insrsid13653462 with}{\fs20\insrsid2431242\charrsid3826418  include the }{\fs20\insrsid15878889 Canton}{\fs20\insrsid2431242\charrsid3826418 

 Fire Department, }{\fs20\insrsid5388677 the }{\fs20\insrsid2431242\charrsid3826418 HAZMAT team and the }{\fs20\insrsid15878889 Madison}{\fs20\insrsid2431242\charrsid3826418  County}{\fs20\insrsid89176  L}{\fs20\insrsid2431242\charrsid3826418 

ocal Emergency Planning Committee.}{\fs20\insrsid2431242 

\par }{\fs20\insrsid13073620 

\par {\listtext\pard\plain\fs20\insrsid2431242\charrsid3826418 \hich\af0\dbch\af0\loch\f0 6.\tab}}\pard \ql \fi-360\li720\ri0\widctlpar\jclisttab\tx720\aspalpha\aspnum\faauto\ls1\adjustright\rin0\lin720\itap0\pararsid24

31242 {

\fs20\insrsid2431242\charrsid3826418 THE GENERAL ACCIDENTAL RELEASE PREVENTION PROGRAM AND THE SPECIFIC PREVENTION STEPS

\par }\pard \ql \li360\ri0\widctlpar\aspalpha\aspnum\faauto\adjustright\rin0\lin360\itap0\pararsid2431242 {\fs20\insrsid2431242\charrsid3826418 

\par The Peco facility complies with all applicable Federal, State and Local regulations }{\fs20\insrsid3826418\charrsid3826418 including EPA\rquote 

s Accidental Release Prevention Rule.  Our personnel are trained about this during our Hazard Communications Training and through access to our Written Programs.  Our Refrigeration Maintenance operators rec

eive On-The-Job training (OJT).  They are given oral tests and are observed by senior maintenance in order to demonstrate proper job skills and knowledge.  Also, the ammonia system is operated, tested and maintained to the standard of International Instit

ute of Ammonia Refrigeration, the most stringent standard of the industry.}{\fs20\insrsid2431242\charrsid3826418 

\par }{\fs20\insrsid3826418\charrsid3826418 

\par {\listtext\pard\plain\fs20\insrsid3826418\charrsid3826418 \hich\af0\dbch\af0\loch\f0 7.\tab}}\pard \ql \fi-360\li720\ri0\widctlpar\jclisttab\tx720\aspalpha\aspnum\faauto\ls1\adjustright\rin0\lin720\itap0\pararsid3826418 {

\fs20\insrsid3826418\charrsid3826418 THE EMERGENCY RESPONSE PROGRAM

\par }\pard \ql \li360\ri0\widctlpar\aspalpha\aspnum\faauto\adjustright\rin0\lin360\itap0\pararsid3826418 {\fs20\insrsid3826418\charrsid3826418 

\par We work very closely with the }{\fs20\insrsid1277312 Canton}{\fs20\insrsid3826418\charrsid3826418  Fire Department, H}{\fs20\insrsid89176 A}{\fs20\insrsid3826418\charrsid3826418 ZMAT team and the }{\fs20\insrsid1277312 Madison}{

\fs20\insrsid3826418\charrsid3826418  County Local Emergency Planning Committee on emergency preparedness.  We meet periodically with representatives of each to address any changes in the facility or any new concerns.

\par 

\par Also, we have onsite Hazardous Materi

als trained personnel to immediately respond to adverse conditions. This helps minimize the potential of an offsite release.

\par 

\par {\listtext\pard\plain\fs20\insrsid3826418\charrsid3826418 \hich\af0\dbch\af0\loch\f0 8.\tab}}\pard \ql \fi-360\li720\ri0\widctlpar\jclisttab\tx720\aspalpha\aspnum\faauto\ls1\adjustright\rin0\lin720\itap0\pararsid3826418 {

\fs20\insrsid3826418\charrsid3826418 PLANNED CHANGES TO IMPROVE SAFETY

\par }\pard \ql \li360\ri0\widctlpar\aspalpha\aspnum\faauto\adjustright\rin0\lin360\itap0\pararsid3826418 {\fs20\insrsid3826418\charrsid3826418 

\par Currently, Peco trains and tests all refrigeration technicians.  Our preventative maintenance program is 

above standard and our ammonia Process Safety Program is reviewed and updated annually.  Our program is improved continuously through annual updates of our written program and annual training of our technicians.  We also take advantage of new technologies

 when safer and more economical alternatives are available.

\par 

\par 

\par }{\b\insrsid3826418\charrsid3826418 RMP Validation Errors/Warnings --- No Data To Report

\par }{\insrsid3826418 

\par }\pard \ql \li0\ri0\widctlpar\aspalpha\aspnum\faauto\adjustright\rin0\lin0\itap0\pararsid16324746 {\insrsid16324746 

\par }}
